name: RelatedList

fields.name: hideOnDetail
fields.description: When set to true, the related list is hidden from detail pages where it appears as a component to prevent duplicate information from showing.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the component as it appears to console users.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.RelatedList.

description: Represents related list custom components on the sidebars of the Salesforce console.
